pull.title: Updated appveyor job to checkout a specific vcpkg commit ID
pull.body:
This PR sets the vcpkg packages in stone by checking out a specific commit ID whenever they need to be reinstalled. The commit ID was chosen as the most recent commit at the time of this PR.

As per discussion on #17995 (and prior PR's/issues).

events.body: ACK 2bcc70531ac88e29a7d59a1ab8c787c55e7f88f5 - thanks for trying/suggesting all the different approaches, however this looks like the way to go. Should prevent `vcpkg` packages from changing out from under us.
